title: THUG 2 Portable + THUG PRO
description:
Tony Hawk's Underground 2 PC Portable + THUG PRO Installer
Full / Nothing Ripped. All music/scenes/extras included.

---------------------------------------------
I really wanted to put this out to support THUG PRO and attract players!
---------------------------------------------

However, this is a THUG 2 torrent, which features:

- Full story mode, all FMV's, etc.
- All music
- Dummied .prx to allow editing scripts
- Debug Menu added to Game Options

Other than that, no mods, altercations, nothing missing.

---------------------------------------------

Back to THUGPRO,

If you LOVE THPS, THUGPRO is what you want. It features levels from all THPS games, with bonus levels from other titles. It also features online play, controller support, and a dedicated community of daily players!

Simply run the THUGPRO Installer that is also included, select the THUG 2 Portable folder, and enjoy THUGPRO!

For support and mods, check out THMODS.com and THPS-MODS.com
